instructions: Activity Log Go to your Activity Log, in the upper right corner. Edit Your Entry In the Activity Log, choose which day you would like to add to and click that date. Create/Edit An Entry Add your written entry, and if you want to add a picture to go with your entry, click on Add A Photo. Save! Click Save, to save your text and/or picture of your walk/exercise to Walker Tracker. Adjust-Your-Jounral-Entry-(Android).pdf
